name: Stay Cool
description:
Stay Cool is a 2D-Platformer Prototype about an apple named Benjamin Clementine. You play as Benjamin as he attempts to return to his home by escaping the freezer. Benjamin is immensely cowardly, so if he's going to have any hope of making it back to his home,  Benjamin is going to have to "STAY COOL"...  

This version of Stay Cool  was created in the span of 2 weeks as a means of experimentation. Any and all feedback and/or suggestions will be highly appreciated.
